query:
insert into homies_favorite_restaurants (homie_id, user_id, restaurant_id)
                select 
                    h.id, 
                    $1,
                    r.id
                from homies h
                join restaurants r on r.name = $3 and r.user_id = $1
                where h.name = $2 and h.user_id = $1
                limit 1
                returning *;
                ;
